title: The Chosen SSS-Rank
summary: A legendary hunter gives up his title to become a web novelist, only to realize his stories lack realism. To fix this, he disguises himself as a weak F-rank hunter and joins a struggling guild for research. What starts as simple observation turns into genuine admiration, pushing him to grow both as a person and a writer. Can a former god-like warrior succeed as an ordinary novelist?

title: Villain, I’ll Do Everything Except Marriage for You!
I Want To Eat You
summary: A high school boy, Yomi Hashiba, is troubled. He is unable to understand what Mizuki Hanai, a cool girl who became his girlfriend a month ago, is thinking... One day, while he is worrying about his relationship with Mizuki Hanai, he starts to understand her "Kanji"...? (same pronunciation as feeling) This is the beginning of a thrilling coming-of-age romantic comedy about love and kanji!

title: Baby Pharmacist Princess
summary:
Just by clicking the wrong button, I ended up possessing the game's princess character, "Cherise"! Yoon Che-ri, a graduate of a pharmaceutical university. Like the so-called 'hardcore gamer' she is, She unexpectedly appears in the VR game she plays every day. A red rabbit puts her in debt to the game, owing 10 billion gems...

If she doesn't repay the debt of 10 billion gems, she won't be able to log out?

♡ Surprise Quest Triggered ♡

User's ability confirmed as "Pharmaceuticals," customized settings have been completed accordingly. Future quests will focus on "Pharmaceuticals."

[Confirm] ◀

Huh? Why do I feel excessively capable...? If things go on like this, I might be able to return soon!
Will Cherise really be able to settle the 10 billion gem debt and return to her original world?

title: I Became The Black Swan Mother of The White Swan Princess
summary:
The transmigration that happened to others happened to me, too. I’m pretty sure I’m now a supporting character… but exactly which novel is this?

When I opened my eyes, I was a widow with stepdaughters my own age, and not only that, I turned into a black swan every night due to a dark curse! Holding back my tears, I decided to take charge of my fate…wait, why should I? Why So Serious?

A duchess during the day, a queen of the lake during the night – I have the best luck to be able to leisurely float around! Life should be lived unplanned! When I had just about decided to live my life like this, a white baby swan, one that was not in my no-plan life plan, came to me.

“Mommy, are you really my mommy?”

What, you were a person? And even the youngest sibling of the tyrant emperor?

“I’m not your mother! Can’t you tell by the different colors of our feathers?”

I’m a black swan, you’re a white swan! But why is she so crazy cute. Can our mother-daughter love endure the obsession and persecution of this child’s seven brothers, including the tyrant emperors?

title: The Magic Tower’s Problem Child
summary: Once the greatest mage and Grand Magus of the White Tower, Oscar Sage dies in a war against The Demon Emperor—only to awaken twenty years later as the disgraced noble, Oscar Crusian. The once-mighty White Tower lies in ruins, and rival factions hold control over military and resources. With his mana circuits sealed and former allies now enemies, Oscar must rebuild the White Tower, seek vengeance, and reclaim his power before the Mage Council exiles him for good. Will magic rise again or will it be buried forever?

title: Me, The Heavenly Destined Villain
summary:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”

title: Don’t Mess with a Deadly Revenger [Official]
You Can Hear It
summary:
There was an inn with an urban legend among adventurers. "The Inn that won't let you die if you stay there."  
  
Loretta arrives at the inn as part of her quest. What is the secret of the "Deathless Inn?"  
  
"Save Point."  
  
It was an inn ran by an maxed out adventurer with the ability to create "Save Points" who came from another world. He retired from being an adventurer and decided to run an inn, while training newbie adventurers. Loretta, who needs to become strong, will be trained by the innkeeper, Alexander.  
  
If you die, don't worry about it, just hit load!  
  
  
**TL;DR**:   
Isekai + RPG Save Points + POV of a Native instead of the OP Otherworlder  


---

**WN Series Raw (12 different works)**:   
<https://ncode.syosetu.com/s1747d/>

title: I Became the Lost Daughter of the Villain
summary:
I possessed an extra who didn’t even have a name in the novel.

Her features are black hair and purple eyes that means that she is cursed.

And I’m the lost daughter of the villain in the novel?!

***

I thought I was a passing by extra, but she was actually the lost daughter of the villainous Grand Duke.

“Erita, my beloved daughter.”

“My precious little sister. I’ll protect you.”

……are these the bloody villains I’ve seen?

My father and brother, who people said to be cruel, were too sweet to me.

But the villain has a death ending!

It was the first time I received love and warmth, and I decided to change the cruel ending of my friendly family since I possessed it 10 years earlier than the original.

Yeah, I will definitely change my family’s future……

“Erita, I love you.”

What’s wrong with the Male Lead?

title: Demon Lord’s Martial Arts Ascension
summary:
Now that the demonic realm and the heavenly realm have called a truce, the human world has returned to an era of peace.

Jeon Minchul lives the life of an ordinary college student until the day he comes across an artifact from the war and remembers — in his past life, he was the demon king who brought the world to its knees.

Upon recalling these memories, Minchul awakens his old powers, along with some new ones. But can this demon king harness the powers of both good and evil to protect the peace?

title: The Tyrant’s Family Lasts Thanks To Her Inner Voice
summary: After being struck to death by someone falling from the sky, Jiu Jiu found herself causing a commotion in the King of Hell’s palace. To resolve the chaos, the King of Hell allowed her to enter the world of a book, where she became a princess. However, she was no ordinary princess—she was confined to the cold palace. From the start, due to the heroine’s slander, her tyrant father decided to sentence her to death. Jiu Jiu was left speechless, thinking to herself: “No wonder the Xi Chu kingdom collapses 10 years later. With such an indiscriminate tyrant, the fact that it even lasts 10 years is a miracle.”

title: Golden Light Gratia, The Child Loved By God
summary:
Gratia, a girl considered useless and despised by her family, has a revealing dream where a mysterious man predicts a great future for her. She soon discovers that she is the lost daughter of the influential Luciffero family. In a surprising event, after being attacked, a golden light erupts from Gratia, forcing everyone around her to close their eyes.

When the light dissipates, young Gratia disappears and in her place an adult version of herself appears, with distinct features of Luciffero. With an imposing stature and undeniable beauty, she comes across Nea, her mother, and realizes that the transformation expected for the future happened that day.

This was the moment when ten-year-old Gratia and twenty-year-old Gratia switched bodies for the first time.

title: I Became the Daughter-in-Law of the Righteous Mad Dog
summary: When Isabella woke up, she remembered everything—being poisoned by her in-laws and losing everything at their hands before dying. To avoid being married to the Rosemunds after her parents’ deaths, Isabella will do anything to become the daughter-in-law of Duke Barmouth, the feared "Mad Dog" of the empire. Worried for Isabella’s safety, Lord Barmouth treats her coldly to make her change her mind. But Isabella is set on melting the hearts of everyone at the Barmouth duchy to escape death.

title: Yeonwoo’s Innocence
summary:
Yeon Woo possesses such a delicate appearance that he could be mistaken as a female student. However, he has a secret crush on the school idol, Kang Haesol. But the shy and timid Yeon Woo has never said a word to her…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5483716), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=752532)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/yanyudechunqing/list?title_no=1786&page=1)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/yeonwoo/list?title_no=2335&page=1)

title: I’m a Villain, But I’m Favored
summary:
Yeoju is a second-rate author living a mediocre existence in modern-day Korea. A tragic accident lands her in the plot of a bestselling martial arts novel and she wakes up as the infamous villainess Haewon Tang. Hoping to save herself from a gruesome death, Yeoju must figure out who to trust, harness Haewon’s inner chi, and learn martial arts as she fights to save the Sichuan Tang Clan. Can she change the outcome of the novel and prove she’s the worthy hero?

---
Our main character was an unsuccessful romance fantasy novelist when she gets into a hit-and-run then wakes up as the villainess in a best-selling martial arts novel. She uses the information from the novel that she had analyzed in her original life, in order to avoid her death-ending and finding the truth behind what had really happened to her.

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52653435)

* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%96%E0%B8%B6%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%8A_%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B0%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%94/136)

title: In This Life, the Greatest Star in the Universe
summary: Hard-pressed to find good luck in this universe, Sun Woojoo gives up on his dream of becoming an idol in favor of living a normal life. That is, until he finds himself waking up from a car accident on his exam day! But as luck would have it, Woojoo can now copy any move exactly as he sees it, and his two left feet that kept him from debuting are now moving to the beat! With this newfound skill, will Woojoo be able to turn things around and become the star that shines the brightest on stage?

title: I Was More Overpowered Than the Hero, so I Hid My Power!
summary:
From a young age, I've always dreamed of being that “unassuming hero,” appearing ordinary but possessing unmatched strength. But one day, fate took a turn when I was hit by an eight-ton truck, and suddenly, reincarnation was on the table! 

"What would you like to be in your next life?" asked the goddess of reincarnation. Eagerly, I replied, "I wish to become a wimp, but secretly OP!”

She granted my wish, but with an unexpected twist: if anyone ever uncovers my true abilities, my heart will explode! 

This isn't quite the “secretly-OP-wimp-life” I had in mind…

title: How to Live as a Civil Servant in Murim
summary:
One day, Yeon Woohyuk falls into the world of Murim and becomes a government official within it.

He was once a veteran player of the martial arts detective game "The Great Detective of Daehwan Empire."
Then suddenly, without warning, he finds himself reincarnated as a pokoe (detective officer) inside the game.

Fortunately, he realizes that the cases from the game unfold exactly as he remembered, so he begins to adapt by solving them.

But the joy is short-lived—he discovers that his ability known as "Spirit Eye" is actually the result of his dantian (energy core) being forcibly opened,
putting him at risk of an early death.

Being a detective is hard enough—
and now he has to learn martial arts and become a powerful master too?!

title: I Was Doted on After Raising the Final Boss Duke’s Nephew
Miss Forensics
summary: Lin Yan, a cold and arrogant female forensic expert, meets Song Yuhang, a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends, they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently, an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains, a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... They fight for the rights of the living, speak for the dead, and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.

title: Love’s Impossible Quest: For the Broken young lady and the Duke of Dread
The more I die, the more invincible I become.
summary:
"I don't want a world full of only pretty things! I'll become a villainess who will go down in history!!"

For someone who hates a typical "good girl" heroine, I was reincarnated as my favorite otome-game villainess! Since my wish has been granted, I'll be the number one villainess who will go down in history! For that to happen, I need to be strong and intelligent! Also, although I'm just... doing my best, the more of a villainess I become, the more I'm liked by the Prince?! Can I really go down in history―?!

title: Absolute Threshold
I’ve Been Invincible for a Long Time
summary: Over a five-year journey around the world, Ye Changqing first believed he could be like other cool novel protagonist systems with a plug-in, but even the most common immortal cultivator cannot be. Living close to a sect in a small town was his only option, so he started a business. His small store eventually turned into the holy land of all the righteous individuals, and the dog he raised up turned out to be the feared demon king. From that moment on, everyone acknowledged Ye Changqing as a Supreme Master.

title: Demon God of Apocalyptic Behemoth
summary: The prosperous city and peaceful society were suddenly destroyed by the outbreak of doomsday. Countless polluted monsters flooded the world, and the forbidden area descended. Billions of people died and the sea of ​​blood surged as the doomsday worlds were connected. At this time, Chen Chu, who had grown silently and was comparable to a god or demon, stood up. And behind him, there was a black monster that was 10,000 meters tall, shaped like Godzilla, but even more ferocious and huge.

title: The Weakest Slime I Once Saved Became the Strongest and Now Won’t Leave My Side
summary: "I never want to lose someone important to me again." One day, I, a nerdy and bullied boy, was provoked by my classmates to go to an SS-ranked dungeon. Facing an SS-class black dragon that I couldn't do anything about, my chances of survival were zero... At that moment, someone appeared before my eyes... This is the story of the bond between the strongest slime and the weakest me, as we grow together.

title: Heart-Pounding Cute Poem
summary:
Choi Do-yeon continued to make a living as a game streamer in a rented room in Banjiha.
To his hometown senior and broadcasting senior, who helped him a lot,
You'll get a link to a game.
In front of Doyeon, who downloaded [Heart-Pounding Ghostly Poem] without thinking about it
You start to see girls who shouldn't be seen.
Panic is also momentarily timed and the virgin ghost love sim that risks her life begins.

title: Invasion of the Myriad Races: Starting by Taming a Legendary Beast
summary: All races have invaded Earth. Su Bai’s pet turtle evolved into the Black Tortoise , and his cat into the White Tiger . The Vermilion Bird and Azure Dragon , ancient sacred beasts, soon followed. However, these divine beasts have enormous appetites, which led Su Bai to become a notorious businessman that gives everyone headaches.“Brother, this is Black Tortoise blood, only selling for a mere ten billion. Hey, why are you cursing at me just because you’re not buying?”“The champion of the Hundred Schools competition wins ten billion? Help me up, I can still fight!”“The main city of all races has countless riches? As a human, I must protect my Dragon Country. I will lead the charge!

title: Divorce Is Easy, But Love Is Hard
summary:
Ji Sina, a senior attorney at K Law Firm, is full of ambition. In order to proudly inherit her father's law firm in the future, she went through a difficult road and finally sat down as a partner lawyer, but she was then told that a guy like a horse snatched the position, the same one which had witnessed her dark history from her 20's, Sina, who is nice and kind to everyone, only has one man she can never get close to, and the person in all of these positions is Ryu Kang Hyun. Seduce such a person and say that you will inherit the law firm only if you succeed in marriage?

"I have a lot of divorce experience, but I don't know much about dating!"

The romance between Sina, an ambitious woman who doesn't know where to go, and Kang-hyun, a senior who doesn't know what's going on, begins.

---
[Original Novel](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6312288)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9608891), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=808201)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/lihunrongyilianainan/list?title_no=2438)

title: The Art Student Who Lived Twice
summary:
Lee Jae-ha dreamed of becoming a successful designer — but just as things were looking up, he was falsely accused of plagiarism and his world came crashing down. 

"If only I could start over… like in those web novels…"

And in the blink of an eye, he does. He opens his eyes and finds himself 10 years in the past, back in art school, with all his memories and work experience from the future intact. 

Now armed with both a second chance and real-world wisdom, Jae-ha is determined to do it all differently: Build a name for himself on campus Land a job before anyone else And most importantly, clear his name once and for all No more regrets. No more failures. 

This time, he’ll paint his own masterpiece of a life.

title: Return of the Apocalypse-Class Death Knight
summary:
Damien Haksen was once a gifted warrior with a bright future, but everything changed when a powerful Archlich twisted him into a Death Knight. Controlled by dark magic, he murdered his own family and helped destroy a kingdom. He broke free at the very end — too late to undo the damage. 

But fate gave him one more chance.

Now back in the past, Damien is determined to protect the people he once lost and destroy the dark mages who turned his life into a nightmare. This time, he’ll fight not for glory, but for love, redemption, and the future of his family.

title: Becoming a God, Starting as water monkey
summary: The protagonist, Liang, transmigrates to a world called the Great Wilderness. He was In a desperate situation, he accidentally awakens a system called the “Ze Bloodline System,” and everything changes from that moment! By infusing himself with the bloodlines of ancient divine beasts, the protagonist is able to gain immense power while gradually refining his own godly talents. Come! Fuse with the Ze Spirit bloodline!!! System: “Awakened bloodline—Water Monkey.” Protagonist: “???”

title: Domestication of Divine Beasts at the Beginning
summary: All races have invaded Earth. Su Bai’s pet turtle evolved into the Black Tortoise , and his cat into the White Tiger . The Vermilion Bird and Azure Dragon , ancient sacred beasts, soon followed. However, these divine beasts have enormous appetites, which led Su Bai to become a notorious businessman that gives everyone headaches.“Brother, this is Black Tortoise blood, only selling for a mere ten billion. Hey, why are you cursing at me just because you’re not buying?”“The champion of the Hundred Schools competition wins ten billion? Help me up, I can still fight!”“The main city of all races has countless riches? As a human, I must protect my Dragon Country. I will lead the charge!

title: Genius Martial Arts Trainer
summary:
Demons came pouring from a portal that appeared out of nowhere and caused the Cataclysm. But all hope is not lost thanks to the Awakeners, people who can fight these demons. 

Lee Jun, a D-rank Awakener, is one of them. He fought demons heroically, but as someone who inherited nothing from his family, he could only go so far. 

As Jun Lee’s life slowly whittled away, a system message appeared, informing him that a special martial arts route had opened...

title: Heavenly Grand Archive’s Young Master
summary:
The soul of the charming and imposing Martial Arts Alliance Leader, Hu-Gong, suddenly wakes up in the body of a young man.

That young man’s name is Beom-Hang. He’s the young master of the ‘Heavenly Grand Archive’, one of the three major archives of the Jianghu, yet he is a sorry excuse of a person.

To determine why his soul has swapped bodies, Hu-Gong begins to train Beom-Hang’s body. When the possessed young master of the Heavenly Grand Archive’s movements are totally different from how they used to be, it starts to attract the attention of the Jianghu...

title: Ready Shoot, For love
summary:
"Do you agree with this love, or are you very much against it?" 

What would you do if you finally found the love of your dreams but it is someone you shouldn't have fallen in love with? 

Ichibana is a girl who is a little bit girly and a little bit hot-tempered. She falls in love with Maki, a plain boy in her class, but just as she is about to confess her feelings to him, she finds out, to her surprise that he has a girlfriend!

title: The Princess’s Double Life
summary: The 27-year-old Sei Shonagon, depicted here as a sort of medieval NEET, manages to land a job as the private tutor of a beautiful and refined 13-year-old, Princess Teishi. There are also a number of other quirky court ladies, some of whom have their eyes on Shonagon.

title: How to Reject the King’s Scout
Obssesed butler
summary: No summary available.

title: S-Class Spirit Master’s Taming Diary
summary:
In a world where wars were fought with swords and magic, and the only transportation was by horse-drawn carriage…

There, I lived as a spirit master—and died. But then…

I was reborn?!

In this new life, there were hunters and monsters, just like in my previous one. But here, the concept of spirits didn’t exist at all.

"Jackpot!"

Monsters? Dungeons? That’s the hunters’ problem, right? All I want is the simple, ordinary life I’ve always dreamed of!

But, as they say, misfortune strikes when you least expect it.

In a not-so-coincidental coincidence, I touched a mysterious egg in a dungeon, and at that moment…

"Congratulations! You have awakened, Miss Yuina!"

I had awakened as an S-Class Spirit Master?!

With Iz, the mischievous spirit of water!
Rika, the playful spirit of wind!
And me, Yuina, the S-Class Spirit Master who has lost all hope of an ordinary life!

An S-Class Spirit Master's desperate journey to reclaim her peaceful life!
"Just give me back my normal life!"

title: Noir of June
Please Don’t Come To The Villainess’ Stationery Store!
summary:
"A useless thing like you has no value in our family. Take this money and leave immediately!"

"Yes! Goodbye!"

She became the incompetent villainess who commits wrongdoings in order to earn the love of her fiancé, the male lead. Her reputation was already at rock bottom and the main characters, who can't live without each other, are having an affair.

"Getting kicked out and receiving money is good enough!"

So after she was kicked out, she set up a stationery store in front of a school. She reminisces of snacks, beer candy, and even bubbles! Just you wait, kids! But… somehow her young customers are a little weird?

"I'll find you a handsome and modest man, and not someone who has an affair like my brother!"

"Ha, then what about my brother, the crown prince?”

"…the tower master is the best."

The great magic swordsman, the crown prince, the villainous tower master, and finally, the hidden villain. The stationery store, which she thought would be peaceful, left her with no rest.

*Help me! I just wanted to live a normal life!*

---
What's a girl to do when she wakes up in the body of a villainess? Meldenique Babelloa is a supporting character in a romance novel starring her fiancé, Duke Lennox Hessman, and… her sister, Sheria! Heartbroken, she eventually dies a tragic death as a villainess… or so the original story goes. Determined not to follow the script, Meldenique resolutely abandons her old life and sets out to open… a stationery shop! Will she succeed in defying fate and building the stationery shop of her dreams?

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home/55148613)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/103612)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B0/396)

title: The Prince Doesn’t Cry From Mere Onions
summary:
The cursed war is over. Three years have passed. It seems like this rural village has finally settled down… But now, some bear-like vagrant barges into our restaurant, spouting nonsense.

“I’ve come to repay a debt I owe your father from the war.”

And yet, this guy doesn’t even know what he supposedly owes. My father passed away during the war, so there’s no way to ask him! I told him to just leave, but this vagrant says:

“How much do you want? I’ll pay whatever you ask.”

Do I look like I lack pride, even if I’m short on money?

“Forget the money, pay it back with labor.”

“…With my body, or someone else’s? Either way, I can—”

“Just go chop some onions!”

title: How to Protect My Sub Male Lead Dad
summary: Hanelope knows her dad, Prince Hart von Reinhart, is a good person, it’s just that the world doesn’t know it! The cunning Saint Asta has fooled everyone into thinking the prince is a cruel monster, so Hanelope is determined to put a stop to it once and for all! Hiding her quick wits behind a cute smile, she fights against pesky vassals, malicious rumors, and the manipulative Asta for her dad's happiness. Can Hanelope give her dad a happy ending? Or is this too much for a little girl to handle?

title: The Baby Concubine Wants to Live Quietly
summary:
I possessed a supporting character in a reverse harem novel. A young concubine who, in the end, was driven to death for treason after begging for attention from the regnant empress who was the female lead, and doing wicked things to the male leads who were the concubines. Despite everything, the fortunate thing was that I possessed her right after entering the Imperial Palace. Even if everyone in the Imperial Palace were wary of me, they didn’t hate me yet.

‘Let’s not be impudent, and be obedient.’

I obstinately didn’t need nor have the mindset of trying to be loved by the Empress. Although the male leads who were the concubines were giving me glances, I could just lie flat. Since it wasn’t even a very difficult thing, I really did so. It was definitely like that, but–

“Come to my bedchamber tonight. I’ll read you a fairy tale book!”

“P-please don’t cry. I’ll give you this.”

Just why is everyone’s attitude endlessly gentle? I couldn’t understand. And it was baffling.

‘…I don’t need it though?’

I wasn’t really a young kid lacking affection. And that gaze in which they looked at me as if I were the loveliest in the world was extremely uncomfortable. Just where would I use a fairy tale book that’s full of jewels and silk, and the magic pearl which is the Imperial family’s heirloom? Since it’s already been done, I just wish for everyone to get out of my palace.

---
In the nation of Seora, Yehwa Aryun is the Empress Regnant, and her court is full of consorts with special powers. The newest member of the imperial court is 8-year-old Sanya Yeoran. And although she has no powers, Sanya actually has the mind of an adult who knows exactly what will happen in this fantasy world, because she already read about it in her past life. Thanks to that, she comes up with a plan to avoid her tragic execution: stay away from Yehwa and her jealous consorts at all costs!

title: A Perfect Ending Plan of the Villain in a Fairy Tale
summary:
[There was a pitiful girl who cried tears of diamond and lived while being abused by her family. But a prince appeared and killed off the entirety of the evil family. And so, the girl lived happily ever after with the prince.]

...is the fairy tale, but I reincarnated as the evil sister, 'Marcia Blick'?!

This damned household! I have to escape from this house now, at least! But if I run away, what about my sister who will be left behind? I've made my decision! We're going to run away together!

'Larisa. Let's go find that prince who will make you happy!'

But: "Please marry me."

Prince, why are you proposing to me? Your partner isn't me, but my sister! This sister of yours will make you a 'perfect ending plan'!

---

title: The Little Princess Waits for the Breakup
The Genius Tamer of the Academy
summary:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)

title: I Tried To Be Her Loyal Sword
summary:
To save her younger sister Aria from her illness, Cassmire Crisis became a mercenary, wielding a sword and shedding blood to pay for her medicine. 

But when Cassmire suffers a fall one day, memories of her past life as Aria’s wicked stepsister come flooding back. Rather than take up the role of villainess again, Cassmire vows to protect Aria this time. 

But with Aria doomed by the story to face only hardships, Cassmire must pick up her weapon once more to become her sister’s loyal sword!

---
